Cough: Drink warm fluids and rest. If symptoms persist, consult a doctor.
Fever: Stay hydrated, rest, and monitor your temperature. Consider paracetamol for relief.
Fatigue: Get plenty of sleep and maintain a balanced diet. If persistent, see a doctor.
Headache: Stay hydrated and avoid screen time. Over-the-counter pain relief may help.
Shortness of Breath: Seek immediate medical attention if severe. Rest and avoid exertion.
Nausea: Avoid greasy foods, drink clear fluids, and rest.
Dizziness: Sit or lie down immediately. Stay hydrated and avoid sudden movements.
